author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HENRIETTE FORECAST TO STILL BE A HURRICANE FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO...
summary: ...HENRIETTE FORECAST TO STILL BE A HURRICANE FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO... As of 11:00 AM HST Mon Aug 11 the center of Henriette was located near 29.8, -157.8 with movement NW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...HENRIETTE FORECAST TO STILL BE A HURRICANE FOR ANOTHER DAY OR TWO... As of 11:00 AM HST Mon Aug 11 the center of Henriette was located near 29.8, -157.8 with movement NW at 18 mph. The minimum central pressure was 986 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 85 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Henriette (CP3/EP082025)
